context: 3. Investments in subsidiaries The additions in the year and prior year relate to equity-settled share-based payments granted to the employees of subsidiary companies. Subsidiary undertakings are disclosed within note 35 to the consolidated financial statements.
questions: What do the additions in the year and prior year relate to?
What are the components factored in the calculation of investments in subsidiaries at end of the period?
In which year were Additions larger?
What was the change in Additions in 2019 from 2018?
What was the percentage change in Additions in 2019 from 2018?
